long_description: The REI Packable Travel hat shades you from the sun while complementing your style. Cotton/polyester hat can be packed in a bag when you head out the door, and it will snap back to shape when you go to wear it. With a UPF 25 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. 2.5 in. brim shades your face and neck from the sun. Elastic sweatband helps move moisture and secure the fit of the REI Packable Travel hat.
short_description: The REI Packable Travel hat shades you from the sun while complementing your style.
